skill.name: Defence Up
skill.normal: Decreases the time it takes to equip and unequip pistols by 80%.
skill.ace: You gain a 10% increased weapon accuracy with pistols.

skill.name: Sentry Targeting practice
skill.normal: Pistol magazine sizes increased by 15 bullets.
skill.ace: You gain a 100% increase in rate of fire with pistols.

skill.name: Eco Sentry
skill.normal: Each successful pistol hit gives you 10% increased weapon accuracy for 10 seconds and can stack up to 4 times.

skill.name: Engineering
skill.normal: You deal 5 additional damage with pistols.
skill.ace: You now 10 additional damage with pistols.

skill.name: Jack of all Trades
skill.ace: Akimbo weapons gain an additional 8 weapon stability and have 50% increased total ammo capacity.

skill.name: Tower Defence
skill.normal: Each successful pistol hit grants 10% damage boost for 6 seconds and can stack 4 times.

skill.name: Hardware Expert
skill.normal: You gain a 50% increase to bleedout health.

skill.name: Combat Engineering
skill.normal: Reload and swap weapons 80% faster after getting up for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: You move 30% faster for 10 seconds after getting up.

skill.name: Drill Sawgeant
skill.normal: You take 30% less damage after getting up for 10 seconds.
skill.ace: Regain 15% of you max hp when getting up.

skill.name: More Firepower
skill.normal: When getting downed you gain the ability to keep on fighting for 3 seconds with a 60% movement penalty before going down.
skill.ace: You no longer need to reload and can fight for an additional 6 seconds when Swan Song activates.

skill.name: Kick Starter
skill.normal: When you get downed you have a 25% chance to instantly get revived.
skill.ace: Chance to get instantly revived is increased by an additional 50%.

skill.name: Fire Trap
skill.normal: You are instantly revived if you kill an enemy while in bleedout. You have 1 charge.
skill.ace: Messiah charge is replensihed whenever you use a doctor bag.

skill.name: Steady Grip
skill.normal: You take 50% less damage from melee attacks.
skill.ace: You are 50% more likely to knock down enemies with a melee strike.

skill.name: Heavy Impact
skill.normal: You start at and cannot heal above 30% of you maximum health. You also take 40% less health damage.
skill.ace: Health damage is now reduced by 60%.

skill.name: Fire Control
skill.normal: Your melee attacks against non special enemies do 50% more damage.
skill.ace: Your melee attacks against special enemies do 50% more damage.

skill.name: Shock and Awe
skill.normal: Every kill you get will increase your next melee attack by 50% up to a maximum of 200%. This effect gets reset when striking an enemy with a melee attack.
skill.ace: Whenever you kill an enemy with a melee attack, you will gain a 50% increase in reload speed for X seconds

skill.name: Fast Fire
skill.normal: When charging your melee weapon you will counter attack enemies that try to strike you, knocking them down. the knock down does not deal any damage.
skill.ace: You gain the ability to counter attack cloakers.

skill.name: Body Expertise
skill.normal: The lower your health, the more damage you do, When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 250% more melee and saw damage.
skill.ace: The lower you health the more damage you do. When your health is beloew 50% you will do up to 100% more damage with ranged weapons as well.
